mapper.select: select a.mail_id, a.from_name, a.from_address, a.to_name, a.to_address, a.mail_weight, a.state_id, b.state_name as state_name, a.package_num, a.mail_date, a.vid, c.vname as village_name from mail a Left outer join state b on b.state_id = a.state_id Left outer join village c on c.vid = a.vid
